content: flame out by shannon larson this hat will fit a small adult to a child as written materials needed abbreviations yarn k-knit 1 hank malabrigo rios pearl ten mc p-purl 1 hank malabrigo rios sand bank cc use mc-main color about half of this color cc-contrasting color dpns-double pointed needles needles sts-stitches us size 6 and us size 8 16 circular c/o-cast on us size 8 dpns cn-cable needle round-round stitch markers k2tog-knit two together cable needle c8f-slip 4 sts onto cn and hold in front k4 darning needle k4 from cn c8b-slip 4 sts onto cn and hold in back k4 k4 from cn gauge 22 sts and 22 row in 4 worked in cable pattern in the round notes this hat knits up tight so feel free to go up a needle size or add an additional 16 sts to cast on another pattern repeat make sure your floats are loose due to the tight nature of this pattern always end body of hat pattern with either a round 1 or 5 of pattern body of hat cable pattern worked in repeats of 16 sts c/o 112 sts with smaller needles in mc and round 1 *c8f k2 mc k2 cc k2 mc join to work in the round work 1 1/2 inches k2 cc * repeat in k2p2 rib rounds 2-4 *k2 mc k2 cc * repeat set up round *k2 mc k2 cc * repeat ** round 5 *k2 mc k2 cc k2 mc k2 cc until the end while doing so place markers c8b* repeat every 16 sts for pattern repeat rounds 6-8 *k2 mc k2 cc * repeat begin cable pattern and work for a total of 3 pattern repeats plus 5 additional rounds shape crown round 1 *k2 mc k2 cc k2 mc k2tog cc * repeat round 2 *k2 mc k2 cc k2 mc k1 cc * repeat round 3 *k2 mc k2 cc k1 mc k2tog cc * repeat switch to dpns when needed round 4 *k2 mc k2 cc k1 mc k1 cc * repeat round 5 *k2 mc k2 cc k2tog cc * repeat round 6 *k2 mc k3 cc * repeat rnd7 *k2 mc k1 cc k2tog cc * repeat round 8 *k2 mc k2 cc * repeat round 9 *k2 mc k2tog cc * repeat round 10 k mc around round 11 *k1 mc k2tog mc * repeat round 12 k2tog mc around cut mc yarn leaving 10 tail pull yarn through live sts to sinch up hole and weave in all ends wear and enjoy copywrite shannon larson 2014 pattern for personal use only
